seo.title: Cinque Terre Beaches 2025 | Sandy Beaches & Swimming Spots
seo.description: Discover the best beaches in Cinque Terre. Sandy shores in Monterosso, rocky coves, secret swimming spots, and crystal-clear Mediterranean waters.

body.title: Cinque Terre Beaches & Swimming
body.subtitle: Sandy beaches, hidden coves, crystal-clear waters, and dramatic cliffside swimming spots along the Ligurian coast

body.title: Where to Swim in Cinque Terre

features.title: Monterosso Beaches
features.description: The only sandy beaches in Cinque Terre with beach clubs, umbrellas, and easy access for families

features.title: Fegina Beach
features.description: Long sandy beach with services, restaurants, and the iconic Giant statue overlooking the bay

features.title: Old Town Beach
features.description: Smaller sandy beach near Monterosso's historic center with calmer waters and local atmosphere

features.title: Vernazza Harbor
features.description: Rocky swimming area in the picturesque harbor with deep water and cliff jumping spots

features.title: Manarola Swimming
features.description: Rocky platforms and ladders for swimming in crystal-clear waters below the village

features.title: Riomaggiore Marina
features.description: Small harbor beach and rocky swimming areas with excellent snorkeling opportunities

body.title: Explore More Water Activities
body.description: Discover boat tours, kayaking, snorkeling, and coastal adventures in Cinque Terre
